attributes.action: Levvy a financial penalty against the production/purchase of energy consuming air freshners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, there has been an increase in the number of "plug in" air freshners. Do we really need to use energy to freshen our homes? I don't think so. There should be a charge to the purchaser or the maunfacturer that would cover the cost of producing a renewable energy that would balance the amount of energy used by the wastefull devises.
